name: Yng.Dev.
upgrade_notice: ATTENTION: Lots of changes were made since last version, including class changes (for instance: mr-custom to mr-customlayout). It's highly recommended to do a backup before updating! You might need to update manually or do some changes to your widgets on a local/test environment. It will be worth it in the end.
author: Marcos Rego

sections.description: Yng.Dev. brings you for free a widget / module to display categories and posts with descriptions, media and links, in a variety of layouts with many customizable options.
